segments.text: I'm going to the United Stated to attend my daughter's commencement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How nice ! Are you going to convert some RIB to US dollars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But I will not take much cash with me I can ask the bank to give me the traveler's checks . So it will be safer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can you cash them when you arrive in the United States ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will go to the bank , give them my check , show them one piece of my identifications , and the most important thing is that I should sign my name to endorse the check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds quite simple . Next time when I travel abroad , I will apply for this kind of check too .
segments.speaker: S2
